title: The Apprentice 2019 contestants: meet Lord Sugar's remaining candidates
text:
The Apprentice is back for – if you can believe it – a 15th series.

The 2019 contestants were first introduced on Wednesday 2 October - and some things never change. Lord Sugar is still after someone he can give a £250,000 "life-changing" investment; Claude Littner and Baroness Brady are still the enforcers in the boardroom; the weekly tasks still involve a mixture of simplicity and (somehow) all the difficulty in the world.

This year's hopefuls are being narrowed down one-by-one each week. Let's meet this year's candidates...
